abstract: Late legendary gossip columnist Hedda Hopper, subject of new film Trumbo, is one of first public figures known for her fashion sense.
lead_paragraph: The gossip columnist, played by Helen Mirren in the new film “Trumbo,” was a savvy self-marketer, one of the first public figures to use wardrobe and artifice to turn herself into a viable American icon.

headline.main: For Gossip Columnist Hedda Hopper, Flamboyance Was Her Brand
headline.print_headline: A Columnist’s Flamboyance Was Her Brand
